code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TaskItem(_ref){let{task,onDelete}=_ref;const formatDate=date=>{const options={year:'numeric',month:'short',day:'numeric',hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit'};return new Date(date).toLocaleDateString('en-US',options);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"task-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"task-title",children:task.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"task-date",children:formatDate(task.createdAt)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-btn",onClick:()=>onDelete(task._id),children:"Delete"})]});}export default TaskItem;
